name: AI Plus Khmer Chat
description: Intelligent Gemini-powered chat application with bilingual (Khmer/English) support, user accounts, Premium/Ultra2 plans (mock activation), image uploads, voice input, diagram generation, Google Search, configurable AI styles, and persistent chat history. Includes a Code Playground with CodeBot (generate/analyze/correct code), an Image Generator, and File Conversion tools (simulated PDF-to-Word, AI Image-to-Text, AI Khmer Text Refiner). Code Complete Review: 20240815120000.
